Managing Director (M.D) Job at Olatunji Cole & Co.




        
    

        
        Olatunji Cole & Co. was established and registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission in 2009 to carry out the business of Accountancy, Audit and Financial/Management Consultancy and training Services.

The firm’s philosophy is the provision of professional services of the highest quality and with innovative approaches to meet the needs of our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Managing Director (M.D)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Reports to: Board of Directors
Job Type: Full Time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Leading and managing the executive team across various functions
	Direct daily operations to achieve targets and budgets
	Implement board decisions
	Signing contracts on behalf of the company and assuming full responsibility for their performance.
	Responsible for the smooth running of projects with timely completion, within budget, to the standard expected.
	Supervise the senior management team to contribute to all strategic decisions.
	Implement health and safety protocols and procedures to ensure a safe working environment for the construction team and stakeholders.
	Identify potential risks and issues related to construction projects and develop mitigation strategies to minimize disruptions and delays.
	Control and oversee the company's finances and budgets
	Manage project costs and variations to minimize expenses without compromising quality.
	Improve the business's overall performance.


Job Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in construction management, civil engineering or a related field from a reputable institution
	Advanced degrees (MSc or MBA )will be an added advantage
	Professional Certifications such as COREN, etc
	We require the services of a top-notch senior executive, with responsibility for overall strategic leadership and operational management of the company.
	Good verbal and written English skills
	Team spirited/Management skills
	Leadership abilities and Initiative skills
	Problem-solving Skills
	Technical Expertise and Proficiency
	Ability to define problems. Establish facts, analyse situations and make decisions.


Experience:


	The candidate, with no less than 45 years old, should have extensive experience and expertise of not less than 15 years in construction management or related roles, with a strong track record of successfully managing construction projects of varying size and complexity.


Remuneration
Very competitive as per industry / sector standards.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@olatunjicoleandco.com and olatunji.cole@olatunjicoleandco.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

        HT-Limited is a Business Management Consulting firm, offering support in business development, human resources management and administration. HT-Limited is a member of the Chartered Institute of Personnel Management in Nigeria, with offices in Lagos, Nigeria and Accra, Ghana. We provide customised HR consulting solutions for employers looking to reduce risks and overhead costs, so more time can be spent on revenue-generating activities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Production Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Role and Responsibilities

	The Production Officer is a key role in manufacturing Isheda Skincare products to meet defined quality standards.


Responsible for the following:


	Manufacture assigned products strictly following the documented manufacturing process as contained in the batch record.
	Understand and apply the concept of Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP)
	Supervise cleaning of the factory to ensure that cleaning is carried out in accordance with GMP, as documented in cleaning SOPs.
	Ensure proper record keeping and filing of manufacturing and other records.
	Adhere to all Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs).
	Comply with all safety protocols, and ensure that other staff also comply.
	Record inventory of raw materials, finished products and packaging materials as procured and track usage.
	Ensure good housekeeping.
	Deliver assigned tasks promptly and to the expected level of quality.


Qualifications and Educational Requirements


	Candidates should possess a B.Sc. Degree in Chemistry or Industrial Chemistry, or B.Eng / B.Sc. Degree in Chemical Engineering.


Required Skills and Capabilities:


	1 - 2 years of experience.
	Must be methodical and organised.
	Teamwork, work collaboratively with other team members.
	Able to concentrate on ongoing tasks.


Method of Application

title: Job Openings at Supersaver Supermarket
content:
Supersaver Supermarket - Established in 2013, Supersaver Supermarket is Nigeria's fastest-growing brand in the retail sector with branches in different parts of Lagos and massive expansion plans in various parts of Nigeria. Our businesses cut across retail trade, wholesale trade, manufacturing and Agriculture.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Warehouse Loader

Job Location: Shangisha, Magodo - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Loading packaged shipments onto shipping trucks
	Bundling packages prior to loading
	Operating hand trucks for loading of individual packages
	Unloading incoming shipments from shipping trucks and transporting to warehouses
	Logging inventory
	Recording changes to scheduled shipments
	General warehouse maintenance.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an SSCE with 0 - 2 years of work experience.


Application Closing Date: 30th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: supersaverhr@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Cashier

Job Location: Ajao, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Accurate sales using the point-of-sales Software provided
	Cross-checking the POS to ensure goods machined are the same as goods being packed for customers
	Correct reporting of sales with clear distinction of cash from cheques and others approved medium of payment.
	Accurate delivery of daily sales to the manager or accountant on duty
	Scanning items and explaining prices to customers
	Keeping the checkout area, clean and orderly
	Basic math and numerical skills
	Communication and interpersonal skills
	Customer service skill /Attention to detail
	Conflict management and problem-solving
	Any other duties that may be assigned by your Supervisor.


 Experience


	Interested candidates should possess an NCE, OND, BA, BSc or HND qualification with 0-1 year of work experience.
	Proximity to Ajao is key


Salary 
N70,000 - N110,000 per month.

Application Closing Date: 24th November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: supersaverhr@gmail.com using “Cashier -Ajao" as the subject of the mail.

 

3.) Sales Supervisor

Job Location: Ajao, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Supervise and support daily supermarketoperations
	Lead, motivate, and train team members
	Ensure shelves are fully stocked and the store is clean and well-presented
	Handle customer queries and resolve issues promptly
	Monitor stock levels and coordinate with management for replenishment
	Assist with cash handling, banking, and opening/closing procedures
	Ensure health & safety and food safety standards are met.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a BSc Degree with previous experience in a retail or supermarket environment (supervisory role preferred).
	Excellent leadership and communication skills
	Strong attention to detail and a hands-on approach
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage priorities
	Flexible with working hours, including weekends and evenings
	Basic IT skills (e.g., using POS systems, stock software).
	Preferable Female for gender equality.


Salary
N140,000 - N170,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 6th November, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: supersaverhr@gmail.com using “Sales Supervisor - Ajao" as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Janitor / Cleaner (Male)

Job Location: Ago / Okota, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Cleaning and keeping the warehouse environment tidy
	?Assisting in receiving and stacking of goods with other receivers
	Supporting general warehouse activities


Requirements


	 Minimum of SSCE qualification.
	 Physically fit and hardworking.
	 Must live around Ago Palace Way or nearby areas.
	Experience in cleaning or warehouse work is an added advantage.


Salary
N80,000 - N90,000 per month.

Application Closing Date: 24th November, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their  CV to: supersaverhr@gmail.com using "Male Janitor- Warehouse"  as the subject of the mail.

     

    

        Click here to Apply
